original_title: Sara Errani and Andrea Vavassori successfully defend US Open mixed doubles against tennis’ biggest stars | CNN
article_summary: Sara Errani and Andrea Vavassori successfully defended their US Open mixed doubles title, defeating Iga Świątek and Casper Ruud in a controversial new format. The duo, the only doubles specialists in the competition, triumphed despite criticism, earning $1,000,000 in prize money and showcasing the importance of doubles tennis.</s>
